mapper.insert: INSERT INTO conversations (id, room_id, character_id, content, current_location, status, next_speaker, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{roomId}, #{characterId}, #{content}, #{currentLocation}, #{status}, #{nextSpeaker}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, ch.name FROM conversations c LEFT JOIN characters ch ON c.character_id = ch.id WHERE c.room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY c.created_at ASC
SELECT c.*, ch.name FROM conversations c LEFT JOIN characters ch ON c.character_id = ch.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE conversations SET room_id = #{roomId}, character_id = #{characterId}, content = #{content}, current_location = #{currentLocation}, status = #{status}, next_speaker = #{nextSpeaker}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM conversations WHERE character_id = #{characterId}
